name: Avallon AI
long_description: Avallon automates car and freight insurance claims operations from first notice to subrogation. Voice agents handle the claim intake and repair shop outreach, supported by a web app with an AI copilot to handle the rest of the workflow. Adjusters become significantly more productive, resolving claims up to 10x faster at just 10% of the traditional cost.
one_liner: Automate car and freight insurance claims with AI agents
